title: Rob.&.Big.Ultimate.Collection.DVDRip.x264
description:
Wow, here's one I've been wanting to do for many years but had never quite gotten around to it until now. What we have here is a complete collection of the 2006-2008 MTV show Rob & Big, presented in properly cropped DVD-Rips with internal audio commentary and full bonus features included in the two box sets, all uncensored (when applicable), as they were meant to be heard.

There was a few unavoidable snags in the project. Unfortunately, because of how MTV produced these discs before native widescreen was standardized, they were letterboxed in a 4:3 frame, so some small pixelation is unavoidable, as seen in other ripped versions of the series. Also, I couldn't restore noteworthy original song cues from the original airings (such as the season 3 episode 'Vegas,' where Drama's favorite song, T.I.'s 'What You Know?', is replaced due to licensing problems), due to the only available DSR torrents being long dead.

This came out so well, I'm gonna take a break for a bit before I start working on a Viva La Bam Ultimate Collection. And I mean, I'll say it once again: It's stupid that people can't rip the commentary tracks and mux it into the MP4 real quick. How hard is it?? Not very...

Otherwise, enjoy, and spread this as much as you can. I imagine this will be a real treat for big fans of the duo.

Rob & Big - Ultimate Collection
Video: x264 / 640 x 360 / 29.97 FPS
Episode Audio: AAC / 48000 Hz / 192 Kbps CBR
Comment Audio: AAC / 48000 Hz / 192 Kbps CBR
